title: Lombo dos Aguiares
body: A populated place in the parish of Santo António do Funchal. Diogo Afonso de Aguiar, son-in-law of João Gonçalves Zargo, or some of his closest descendants, were the lords of this place, which took its name from its owners.

Santo António do Funchal: Parish where Lombo dos Aguiares is located.

Diogo Afonso de Aguiar: Possible lord of the place Lombo dos Aguiares.
